snippet.title: Plantasia: First Look Trailer
snippet.description:
Cave Bear Games indie studio is proud to present a first look at our upcoming cozy idler title: Plantasia! Grow, research, relax: restoring the universe, one plant at a time. Take on the role of a botanist in an orbital greenhouse! Tasked with growing plants native to now-barren worlds, work to revive planetary life.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/FGd35cq9R3
WEBSITE: https://cavebeargames.com/
TWITTER/X: https://x.com/cavebearstudio
LINKEDIN: https://id.linkedin.com/company/cave-bear-games?trk=ppro_cprof
BLUESKY: https://bsky.app/profile/cavebeargames.bsky.social
